title: IAA Tonight | LeBron James and Chris Paul Comment on Robert Sarver's Suspension
description: Phoenix Suns and Mercury owner Robert Sarver was banned from the NBA for one year and fined $10 million after the NBA on Tuesday released its findings from a 10-month independent investigation into allegations of workplace abuse during Sarver's tenure as managing partner of the Suns that has spanned nearly two decades. LeBron James and Chris Paul expressed their disappointment in the lack of severity of the punishment for Sarver. Brandon Marshall, Adam Pacman Jones and Leger Douzable discuss what the outcome should've been. Plus, Steelers DE T.J. Watt and Seahawks S Jamal Adams suffered severe injuries in Week 1 that will keep them out for some time. The guys give insight on how hard it is to comeback from severe injuries.
author: smanderville@houseofathlete.com (Brandon Marshall, Leger Douzable, Adam Pacman Jones)
